Title: Ip Man 4: The Finale
Writer: Tai-lee Chan (screenplay), Hiroshi Fukazawa, Lai-Yin Leung (screenplay), Edmond Wong
Actors: Donnie Yen, Scott Adkins, Danny Kwok-Kwan Chan, Vanness Wu
Plot: The Kung Fu master travels to the U.S. where his student has upset the local martial arts community by opening a Wing Chun school.
Production: Bullet Films, Shanghai Bona Cultural Media, Mandarin Motion Pictures
